content: In parallel, we’re increasing our nitrate sole production by 320,000 metric tons, which will allow us to meet future demand growth of nitrates for fertilizer and solar soles Finally, for lithium, we remain on target to reach the 180,000 metric tons in the coming months, our plan to reach the 210,000 metric tons and 40,000 metric tons of capacity of lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide respectively advancing well. And our press release is very important for them, and I want to say thank you for a lot of people working very hard in all those years in a very difficult project and trying to deliver good results, and now it’s a great milestone for the company getting the result.
